themes: desire for more diverse art galleries
longstanding lack of progress in gallery diversity
perception of Austin as a place to make but not sell art
key_phrases: a broader and more diverse group of galleries would be fantastic
we've been waiting for that to happen for a long time
great place to make art but not to sell art
if there was a way to shift the perception of austin related to this that wold be helpful
barriers_identified: perception of Austin as unsupportive for selling art
solutions_proposed: shift the perception of Austin related to selling art
